definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: There are flowers between the trees along the road .
sentences.chinese: 沿路兩旁的樹木之間都種着花草。

sentences.english: The garden is carpeted with a mass of multicoloured flowers .
sentences.chinese: 花園裏花草茂密，五彩繽紛。

sentences.english: We are planting a small garden.
sentences.chinese: 我們在給一個小花園栽植花草。

sentences.english: Gardening takes more bother than it's worth.
sentences.chinese: 種那些花草要花費很多的心血，不值得。

sentences.english: But I drink tea, also is flowers and plants can raise the body.
sentences.chinese: 可是我喝的是花草茶，也可以養身體。

sentences.english: House of flowers may have been a calamity, was it frustrating branches off Whispering.
sentences.chinese: 院中的花草可遭了殃，被它折騰的枝折花落。

sentences.english: Canister of basin piling a basin is placed on the balcony, kind on profusion flowers and plants has eyeful green.
sentences.chinese: 在陽臺上擺堆盆盆罐罐，種上繽紛花草就有滿眼綠色。

sentences.english: But hard work and devotion regains the gardens beauty and gives it life again.
sentences.chinese: 但是艱苦的工作和付出使花草重新獲得美麗和重生。

sentences.english: Losing weight through herbal teas is a very popular topic.
sentences.chinese: 喝花草茶減肥是非常流行的。

sentences.english: He would never ravage flowers, certainly not in a cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 而他從不會毀壞花草，當然也不會是在公墓裏。

sentences.english: Plant drought-tolerant shrubs, trees, and grasses, which require far less water
sentences.chinese: 種植耐旱的，需水量遠遠少於其它植物的樹木花草。

sentences.english: Residents planted flowers and trees including pine and cypress in the yards.
sentences.chinese: 每座房子都是一二層高，院子裏栽有花草和松柏等。

sentences.english: The perfumed flowers are our sisters.
sentences.chinese: 那芳香的花草是我們的姐妹。

sentences.english: There are a lot of wild Astragalus Sinicus L growing on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 那邊山上生長着很多野生的紅花草。

sentences.english: His only recreations are drinking beer or staying in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 僅有的消遣是喝啤酒和在花園裏種花草。

sentences.english: Spring is coming, plants are opened tree also green, colorful almond flowers are very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 春天來了，花草都開了樹也綠了，多彩的杏花很漂亮。
